comment: If only Taylor would have spoken up sooner she might have saved America!* But she couldn't do that and write yet several more songs about her ex-boyfriends. Adding more songs to her long line of forgettables had to be done, even if America went down the toilet because she was too busy to care. *Yes, that's all sarcasm
